title: How to Beat Elden Ring in Under 5 Minutes | Speed Break
description: Elden Ring Speedrunner Mitchriz joined Dave Klein (DaveControl) to breakdown some of the ways speed runners break Elden Ring in order to achieve their world record times.

html:
Elden Ring Speedrunner Mitchriz joined Dave Klein (DaveControl) to breakdown some of the ways speed runners break Elden Ring in order to achieve their world record times.

By Dave Klein on October 13, 2024 at 10:00AM PDT

Mitchriz ranks the tricks from easiest to hardest to perform, and details not only how to perform the tricks, but why they actually work. If you enjoy the first episode of Speed Break, let us know what other games you would like to see!

    • View Comments (0)

    Elden Ring
